# OpenAPI Generator Typescript Example

## 1. Make sure your OpenAPI specification is described in a correct way and validated

For the reference approach see https://github.com/vgrigoryevsky/template-openapi


## 2. Generate a single OpenAPI YAML file

For reference see the same link provided above.

## 3. Configure `scripts/openapitools.json` [already done]


## 4. Install `openapitools`

`npm install @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli -g`

For more info see https://openapi-generator.tech/docs/installation

## 5. Run `scripts/openapi.sh`

## 6. Check `src/@generated/api.ts` [already available in this example]
